content: dress your labubu up in some handknits this boxy little crop top looks adorable on labubu and the best part is you can make your labubu a sweater in the same yarn as one of your sweaters so you can be twinsies size sized to fit a labubu plush pendant needles us 2 2 75mm 37 / 93cm circular needles or dpns or size needed to obtain gauge yarn sock/fingering a super tiny amont of yarn around 30 yards sample is knit with crow & crescent yarn callisto stock in arachne notions darning needle for weaving in ends stitch markers optional waste yarn or extra needles
